body_html: Because we wanted to allow dim=None in Python and route to a different function. Essentially the problem was wanting to wrap the C++ function in Python. AFAIK there is no way of translating dim=None behavior into C++? So Richard and I came up with this strategy

body: Because we wanted to allow `dim=None` in Python and route to a different function. Essentially the problem was wanting to wrap the C++ function in Python. AFAIK there is no way of translating `dim=None` behavior into C++? So Richard and I came up with this strategy
